qas.question: What team won the first match in the 1943 Copa del Generalissimo?
What was the score of the second match in 1943 played against Real Madrid?
Who is rumored to have threatened Barcelona players before the match against Real Madrid?
What journalist alleged that the Barcelona team was threatened to make certain of Real Madrid's win?
What was proven about the alleged threats to Barcelona before the game?

context: In 1943, Barcelona faced rivals Real Madrid in the semi-finals of Copa del Generalísimo (now the Copa del Rey). The first match at Les Corts was won by <a0_0>Barcelona<a0_0/> 3–0. Real Madrid comfortably won the second leg, beating Barcelona <a1_0>11–1<a1_0/>. According to football writer Sid Lowe, "There have been relatively few mentions of the game [since] and it is not a result that has been particularly celebrated in Madrid. Indeed, the 11–1 occupies a far more prominent place in Barcelona's history." It has been alleged by local journalist <a3_0>Paco Aguilar<a3_0/> that Barcelona's players were threatened by <a2_0>police<a2_0/> in the changing room, though <a4_0>nothing<a4_0/> was ever proven.
